title: ANDavan nIyE
sahitya:
ANDavan nIyE shOdanai sheidhAl yAriDam sholvEn enna sheivEn


anupallavi

  tUNDil muL mIn pOla tunbak-kaDalilE tuDituDikka viTTu vEDikkai pArkka


caraNam    oru tavarum ariyA iv-vaDimai engE ulaga nAyakan nI engE
karuppai vAsamum kAla pAshamum kaDakka vazhiyinri naDukkam eDukkudE
